# auto-generated by grc.converter

id: fhss_utils_fft_burst_tagger
label: FFT Burst Tagger
category: '[Sandia]/FHSS Utilities'

parameters:
-   id: center_frequency
    label: Center Frequency
    dtype: float
    default: '1626000000'
-   id: fft_size
    label: FFT Size
    dtype: int
    default: '1024'
-   id: sample_rate
    label: Sample Rate
    dtype: int
-   id: max_bursts
    label: Max Bursts
    dtype: int
    default: '0'
-   id: max_burst_len
    label: Max Burst FFTs
    dtype: int
    default: '0'
-   id: burst_pre_len
    label: Pre Burst FFTs
    dtype: int
    default: '5'
-   id: burst_post_len
    label: Post Burst FFTs
    dtype: int
    default: '20'
-   id: burst_width
    label: Burst Width
    dtype: int
    default: '20000'
-   id: threshold
    label: Threshold
    dtype: float
    default: '7'
-   id: history_size
    label: History Size
    dtype: int
    default: '512'
-   id: lookahead
    label: Lookahead FFTs
    dtype: int
    default: '10'
-   id: debug
    label: Debug Output
    dtype: bool
    default: 'False'

inputs:
-   domain: stream
    dtype: complex

outputs:
-   domain: stream
    dtype: complex

templates:
    imports: import fhss_utils
    make: fhss_utils.fft_burst_tagger(${center_frequency}, ${fft_size}, ${sample_rate},
        ${burst_pre_len}, ${burst_post_len}, ${burst_width}, ${max_bursts}, ${max_burst_len},
        ${threshold}, ${history_size}, ${lookahead}, ${debug})
